text: Kare-ra (makka no tashinkyo to) wa, chijo o tabi shite kare-ra izen no mono no saigo ga ikagadeatta ka o, kansatsu shinai no ka. Kare-ra (mukashi no hito) wa, kare-ra yori mo chikara ni oite sugure,-chi o horiokoshi (te kosaku shi), mata kare-ra yori mo haete ita. Soshite shito-tachi wa meisho o motte kare-ra no tokoro ni kita. Arra ga kare-ra o son tta node wanai. Kare-ra ga mizukara jibun o son tta nodearu
